topic.title: Deploying Content Fusion Enterprise on Ubuntu, RHEL, CentOS

keywords.indexterm: Installing an Enterprise server with Ubuntu
Installing an Enterprise server with Red Hat Enterprise Linux
Installing an Enterprise server with CentOS

body.p: This topic contains information for the server administrator about how to install and configure the solution on Ubuntu 22.04/24.04, Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 9, or CentOS 9.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.p:
An Enterprise server solution requires the following:
One of the following fresh Linux distributions:
Ubuntu 22.04 or 24.04 VM ()
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 ()
CentOS 9 ()
Root access to the machine
Docker Engine Community Edition 25, 27, or 28
iptables needs to be installed
At least 100 GB of free disk space
16 GB of memory on the server
4 CPUs

section.title: Installing the Software
section.p:
To install the solution on your machine::
Go to the Download page and download the installation kit.
Run the installer (the installation requires root privileges):sudo bash Oxygen_Content_Fusion_Enterprise.sh
Follow the on-screen instructions.The installation log can be found in the content-fusion-install.log file, in the current directory.
